events.gameview.global

Class EPossibleThief

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • events.AEvent
        • events.gameview.global.EPossibleThief
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAEvent, java.io.Serializable

    public class EPossibleThief
extends AEvent
    Delivers the toggle of the check box in the gameModePanel which activates or deactivates the pos. thief position function.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A.
